name: mufa-line-comp
description: A simple app to track score and co-ed line composition for Madison Ultimate Frisbee Association (mufa.org). The author is not affiliated with MUFA in any way. The use of its name and acronym does not constitute an endorsement of the app by MUFA, and no part of this app should be considered to represent MUFA in any way.
author: Mark Lyon <damionfury@gmail.com>
